name: src/components/component.js
Log
description: The Logger

name: Component
description: It define a basic component

name: GRAB
description: Grabs the broadcast message

name: UNGRAB
description: Grabs the broadcast message

name: CAST
description: Broadcast a message to the broadcast

name: destroy
description: Destroy the component instance

name: constructor
description: Create a component instance

name: src/components/components.js
Components
description: Manage the list of components classes used within the project

name: exists
description: Check if already exists a component within the list

name: index
description:
Returns the index for given component
Returns -1 if component does not exists

name: add
description: Add a component to the list if not already has been adedd

name: remove
description: Remove a component to the list if exists

name: src/core/dom-reader.js
Log
description: The Logger

name: DomReader
description: Read the DOM and check for Zero Components

name: Element
description:
Set the element for all operations
If falsy value is passed it returns the default element `document`

name: Element
description: Get the element. If not defined return the document element

name: Selector
description: Set the element selector using CSS selector specs
see:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/Introduction_to_CSS/Selectors
If falsy value is passed it returns the default selector [data-component]

name: check
description: Return the list of components matching given selector

name: src/events/broadcats.js
Log
description: The Logger

name: Broadcast
description: Grab and dispatch messages throug the dom

name: Broadcaster
description: Get the Broadcaster element

name: cast
description: Cast a message throug the dom

params.name: obj
params.description: callback to execute on message receiving

name: grab
description: Add the listener for given event and dispatch the event

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to execute on message receiving

name: ungrab
description: Remove the listener for given message

params.name: callback
params.description: callback to execute on message receiving

name: constructor
description: Initialize the Broadcast

name: src/events/event-dictionary.js
EventDictionary
description: Manage all the component events for given namespace

name: src/events/event-wrapper.js
EventWrapper
description: A simple wrapper which allows to use method like .on(...), .off(...)

name: one
description:
It listen only for the first occurence of the event
and then it removes the listner

name: element
description: Set the Element which represent the current component

name: element
description: Get the Element which represent the current component

name: constructor
description: Create the wrapper

name: src/index.js
src/utils/inflector.js
Inflector
description: String manipulation utility uses Lodash

name: underscore
description: convert the string to snake case {'Foo Bar' => 'foo_bar'}

name: camelize
description: convert the string to snake case {'Foo Bar' => 'fooBar'}

name: kebab
description: convert the string to kebab case {'Foo Bar' => 'foo-bar'}

name: humanize
description: convert the string to human readable string {'--foo-bar--' >= 'Foo Bar'}

name: constructor
description: create an instance

content:
{
  "name": "zero-es6",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "An openmind's Zero project forked and translated in pure ES6 without jQuery dependency",
  "main": "src/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest --config jest.config.json",
    "doc": "npx esdoc",
    "build": "npx webpack --config webpack.config.js"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.1.2",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-classes": "^7.1.0",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.1.0",
    "babel-core": "^7.0.0-bridge.0",
    "babel-jest": "^23.6.0",
    "babel-loader": "^8.0.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-publish-markdown-plugin": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^5.7.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^13.1.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.14.0",
    "jest": "^23.6.0",
    "regenerator-runtime": "^0.12.1",
    "webpack": "^4.20.2",
    "webpack-cli": "^3.1.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "immutable": "^3.8.2",
    "@openmind/litelog": "^3.0.6",
    "lodash": "^4.17.11"
  }
}
name: package.json
